actions.name: Carmine Reins (Reaction)

cost.trigger: The target resolves an Ability or Attack on the user.

actions.description:
Trigger: The target resolves an Ability or Attack on the user.

Effect: The user loses -1 ATK and SPATK Stage for 7 Activations. Then, the target is @Affliction[suppressed] 5, @Affliction[hindered] 5, and has loses -1 ATK, SPATK, SPD, and EVA Stages for 5 Activations. The user can alternatively use this Ability as a Complex Action during one of its Activations, spending 9 PP at a range of 50m. The user gains 2 Stacks of @Affliction[weary]. Then, the target is @Affliction[bound] 9. While @Affliction[bound], the target is @Affliction[lifted], @Affliction[suppressed], @Affliction[hindered], @Affliction[nullified], and has its default ATK, DEF, SPATK, SPDEF, SPD, and ACC Stages decreased by -2.
